author: Sean Logan War

review: I don't write many reviews but this purchase compelled me to share my experience.This is simply the finest streaming stick we have encountered. We required one for a bedroom that received a weak wi fi signal. After trying all of the competition plus a wi fi range extender, I decided to give the Fire Stick a shot. It was a fabulous decision. This little gem effortlessly streams Netflix and other services in a matter of seconds. The device is very easy to set up and the remote is slender and comfortable to the touch. The Amazon Fire Stick is a small but powerful tool for anyone seeking streaming options that are top of the line as well as affordable. Keep up the great work Amazon!
